channel.title: New Server project
channel.description:
[center]I can provide a .com domain name along with a website.I just cant think of a good name for a domain,please give some suggestions but what im looking for is a hoster and that person needs -good connection -ability to host 24/7 (or close to it) So if you want to host use this
Name: Time able to host: MSN: and go to www.speedtest.net and copy an image of your test results here
[b][u]IF I GET MY LAPTOP FOR CHRISTMAS I CAN HOST 24/7! I JUST NEED TEMPORARY HOSTER[/u][/b] I want to create this because im tired of going to servers that are up for one day and then die... Please dont flame me i am just trying to make a stable private server community also if you want to be a part of this new movement im creating use this to apply: [code] Name: Why do you want to join: Will you be active?: Will you mass: Will you promote the server in a good manner: Are you a good person: will you do your best to keep server alive: Applying for: MSN: Anything els?:[/code] Owners: 8ballcrazy Blex Admins: Mods: Coders: Hosters: Members: ------------------ Forums mods: Forums Admins: Thankyou 8ballcrazy [/center]

item.title: New Server project
item.dc:creator: @Blex Blex
item.description:
@Blex wrote:

Name: Blex
Why do you want to join: I am not doing so well with my own project so I would like to be in on another with a group.
Will you be active?: Yes.
Will you mass: As in click? If so, no.
Will you promote the server in a good manner: Yes.
Are you a good person: Yes.
will you do your best to keep server alive: Of course!
Applying for: Forum Admin

Read full topic

[center]I can provide a .com domain name along with a website.I just cant think of a good name for a domain,please give some suggestions

but what im looking for is a hoster and that person needs
-good connection
-ability to host 24/7 (or close to it)

So if you want to host use this

Name: Time able to host: MSN:

and go to www.speedtest.net and copy an image of your test results here

IF I GET MY LAPTOP FOR CHRISTMAS I CAN HOST 24/7! I JUST NEED TEMPORARY HOSTER

I want to create this because im tired of going to servers that are up for one day and then die…
Please dont flame me i am just trying to make a stable private server community

also if you want to be a part of this new movement im creating use this to apply:
